data.text: @okayhefe @RaeJensen18 @OklahomaCovid Yep nothing but MAGAT’s, just want to cause chaos.
@AKSOKC1 @OklahomaCovid @RaeJensen18 My brother is too and he said they are nuts🤪🤪🤪

@jeepie1960 @RaeJensen18 @OklahomaCovid The point is to cause chaos. It has nothing to do w restrictions (there are very few remaining) or mandates. They’re simply opposing our govt (for no specific reason other than their leaders told them to) &aiming to disrupt the nation, therefore hurting its citizens, not the govt
@RaeJensen18 @OklahomaCovid The convoy is literally one of the dumbest things I have seen.  And I remember the Trump presidency so that should say something.
@RaeJensen18 @OklahomaCovid These truckers are ignorant fools and deserve zero respect. I give them none.

@RaeJensen18 @OklahomaCovid Their issue is with mask mandates, kinda thinking it’s a non issue. They drive alone, they load and unload in open air. Yet, it’s an issue? True Truckers are fantastic. It’s a f…… political stunt. Serves no purpose.

@RaeJensen18 @OklahomaCovid Where is the money coming from?  It’s Russia-

Guarantee once these people realize the money has dried up, they will go back to wanting to work and they are most likely already vaccinated.
@RaeJensen18 @OklahomaCovid My dad is a Trucker and thinks the convoy is foolish.
@RaeJensen18 @OklahomaCovid This is just a stupid bot account trying to stir up trouble. Ignore, block, report
